column6: | Embedded database supporting efficient distributed management of C++ and Java objects. Avoids the complexities and limitations of ORM products such as Hibernate by storing objects directly with their relationships intact. Uses a page-based mapping system for fast locking and efficient distributed client-side caching.

column6: | Small footprint [[embedded database]]. Diverse [[database index|indexes]] and specialized [[collection class]]es; [[LINQ]]; replication; [[ACID|ACID transactions]]; native [[full text search]]; includes Silverlight Android and Java ME demo apps.

column6: | NoSQL REST / Server-Side JavaScript engine. Integrates Webkit JavaScriptCore engine with HTML5 JS APIs supported on the server. Tables and columns are replaced by JavaScript DataClasses and attributes.
